page.title: 04STISTED VILLAGE
page.content: {*}Stisted is a relatively small village with less than 1000 inhabitants.There is a primary school with about 60 children,a small parish church,a village hall,a pub and a shop and sub-post office.Braintree Golf Course is just outside the village.It is used by lots of the local people as well as people from the surrounding district. {*}There is a youth club,and clubs for the over-sixties,keep-fit,whist and bowls.There is also a Mothers' Union. {*}The main activity is farming;there are 3 or 4 farmhouses in the parish. Most people travel to Braintree,Chelmsford,Witham or Colchester to work.Transport out of the village is difficult.School buses come here every day,but shoppers may go to Braintree at only one time on a Wednesday or a Saturday.
